name: Baker, James A. III
political_donations: Republican donor. ~$4,000+ (2000 cycle). Donated to Giuliani Exploratory Committee, Kline for Congress, Bush for President.

name: Bechtel, Riley P.
political_donations: Republican donor. $105,000 in 2012 cycle. Donated to American Crossroads ($25,000), Romney Victory Inc ($12,500), McCarthy Victory Fund ($25,000).

name: Bloomberg, Mike
political_donations: Democrat (formerly R/I). $1B+ self-funded 2020 presidential campaign; donated $10M+ to House Majority PAC, $100M+ to Florida Democratic parties for Biden.

name: Hicks, Thomas O.
political_donations: Republican donor. $83,700 (2000 cycle), $171,728 (2016 cycle). Donated to RNC, Trump Victory, Bush-Cheney, Ted Cruz for Senate.

name: Kissinger, Henry A.
political_donations: Republican donor. $8,100 (2006 cycle). Donated to John McCain 2008 Exploratory ($2,100), Straight Talk America ($5,000), Pat Roberts for Senate ($500).

name: Koch, Charles G.
political_donations: Republican donor. $283,000+ in 2014 cycle alone; Koch network spent $889M+ in 2016 cycle. Donated to NRCC ($32,400), NRSC ($32,400), Romney Victory Inc, multiple Republican Senate candidates.

name: Kovacevich, Richard M.
political_donations: Republican donor. $199,100 in 2012 cycle. Donated to Romney Victory Inc ($70,800), American Crossroads ($50,000), Portman Senatorial Trust ($30,800).

name: McCormick, David H.
political_donations: Primarily Republican donor. $72,904 in 2020 cycle. Donated to Team Hagerty ($20,600), WINRED ($5,745), Elise for Congress ($5,600); minor Biden donation ($1,121).

name: Messmer, Harold M. Jr.
political_donations: Republican donor. $38,300 in 2012 cycle. Donated to NRSC ($30,800), Romney Victory Inc ($5,000), Team Graham Inc ($2,500).

name: O'Reilly, David J.
political_donations: Republican donor. $85,600 in 2008 cycle. Donated to RNC ($28,500), McCain Victory 2008 ($4,600), McConnell Senate Committee ($2,300); one D contribution: Ellen Tauscher ($2,300).

name: Pigott, Mark
political_donations: Republican donor. $30,000 in 2012 cycle. Donated to Romney Victory Inc ($25,000), PACCAR Employees PAC ($5,000).

name: Rockefeller, David Jr.
political_donations: Democratic donor. $35,600 in 2016 cycle. Donated to Ocean Champions PAC ($20,000), Kamala Harris for Senate ($2,700), Hillary for America ($2,700), Whitehouse for Senate ($2,700).

name: Rubenstein, David Mark
political_donations: Bipartisan donor, D-leaning. $14,800 in 2008 cycle. Donated to DSCC ($6,000), Richardson for President ($4,200), Romney for President ($2,000), Hillary Clinton for President ($1,000).

name: Pelosi, Paul F.
political_donations: Democratic donor. ~$14,000+ career. Donated to ActBlue and various Democratic candidates.

name: Ferguson, Niall Campbell
political_donations: Republican donor. ~$7,800 career. Donated to John McCain 2008 Inc ($4,600), Friends of John McCain 2016 ($2,700).

name: Draper, William H. III
political_donations: Primarily Republican donor. $56,000 in 2008 cycle. Donated to RNC ($28,750), McCain Victory California ($10,000), John McCain 2008 ($4,600); one D contribution: Obama for America ($4,250).

name: Byers, Brook H.
political_donations: Democratic donor. $484,850 in 2020 cycle. Donated to Nancy Pelosi Victory Fund ($85,500), DSCC ($71,000), Pennsylvania Democratic Party ($10,000); one R: Rob Portman ($2,900).

name: Frist, William H. M.D.
political_donations: Republican donor. $102,250 in 2002 cycle; $8,400 in 2006 cycle. Former U.S. Senate Majority Leader; spent $3.5M+ self-funded in 1994 Senate race.

name: Alexander, Lamar
political_donations: Republican. Former U.S. Senator (R-TN, 2003-2021). Received $5,200 in self-contributions in 2014 cycle.

name: Boskin, Michael J.
political_donations: Republican donor. $4,500 in 2012 cycle. Donated to Romney for President ($1,000), Romney Victory Inc ($2,500), Boehner for Speaker ($1,000).

name: Roberts, George R.
political_donations: Republican donor. $64,543 in 2020 cycle. Donated to Perdue for Senate ($5,600), Cornyn for Senate ($5,600), Trump Victory (~$10,204), Collins for Senate, Hagerty for Senate; minor D: $1,103.

name: Coulter, James G.
political_donations: Primarily Democratic donor. $73,045 in 2016, $50,813 in 2018, $35,771 in 2020. Donated to DSCC ($25,000), Tom Steyer 2020 ($2,800), ActBlue.

name: Meacham, Jon
political_donations: Democratic affiliation by public endorsement; no itemized FEC individual contributions found. Known Biden speechwriter and presidential campaign surrogate.

name: Schmidt, Eric Clausen
political_donations: Democratic donor. $1,705,512 in 2020 cycle, $445,423 in 2018, $330,202 in 2016. Donated to Democratic Grassroots Victory Fund ($523,950), DNC ($450,000+), Nancy Pelosi Victory Fund ($35,500), Biden for President ($2,800).

name: Inman, Bobby R.
political_donations: Primarily Republican donor. $25,250 in 2004 cycle, $14,250 in 2012 cycle. Donated to McCaul for Congress ($5,500), Cornyn for Senate ($3,000+), Kay Bailey Hutchison ($3,000); minor D: Castro for Congress ($1,500).

name: Greenberg, Maurice R.
political_donations: Republican donor. $15M+ in outside spending in 2016: donated $10M to Right to Rise USA (Jeb Bush super PAC), $5M to Conservative Solutions PAC (Rubio). Personal FEC: $20,200 in 2016 cycle.

name: Feulner, Edwin W. Jr.
political_donations: Republican donor. $3,400 in 2008 cycle. Donated to Republican State Committee of Delaware ($1,000), Jim Gilmore for Senate ($750), John McCain 2008 ($600). Also long-time president of Heritage Foundation.

name: Meese, Edwin III
political_donations: Republican donor. ~$3,000 career (modest personal giving). Donated to Comstock Victory Fund 2018 ($500). Former U.S. Attorney General under Reagan.

name: Reed, Thomas C.
political_donations: Republican donor. ~$2,000+ in 2009-2010. Donated to NRSC ($500), Sam Caligiuri for Senate ($500), Toomey for Senate ($500), Sonoma County Republican Central Committee ($500).
